name: moon·shot
description:
Github Link: https://github.com/floatingtable101/moon-shot

Control with mouse - 5 levels (not including tutorial)

Use your mouse to slow down time and adjust your trajectory

Picking up yellow orbs opens gates and increases your speed and decreases your gravity meaning you go higher and faster

If the game doesn't react to commands, click on it or make it fullscreen, this is a bug from itch.

All done by me in Construct 3

FULL DISCLAIMER: I HAVE NO IDEA HOW TO USE GITHUB I THINK I DID IT RIGHT BUT I'M NOT SURE
